title: Why Self-Learning Is Important
summary: The more data you feed into your AI, the better it performs. Self-learning algorithms are better than humans at continuously learning. They can learn from their own datasets and continuously learn from user input. This is especially useful in the fields of stock market analysis, complex pattern recognition, and language generation. This makes them more appropriate for real-time uses and less appropriate for offline uses.
